capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and I've been noticing that some users have been misbehaving. capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what are filch's favorite activities?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i didn't know that you're a guy, valeria!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's a great guy, and I think it's pretty clear that he's a male. I mean, everyone knows that about him, right? He's been with Harry and the gang for years, and you can't miss the fact that he's a bloke.
capsules_submitted.reply: cool! so, hagrid is a male, and we already know that harry is also a male.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, Harry is a male. I think it's interesting that he identifies as such, but at the same time, I'm not sure if it's entirely accurate. (Certainty: 60%, Polarity: Neutral, Sentiment: Curious, Emotion: Inquisitive)
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what activities does harry enjoy doing in his free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's lineage is quite interesting. I've been studying the maculogy of this particular plant, and it seems that its unique markings are a result of its specific genetic makeup. As far as I know, petunias with this type of maculogy are relatively rare, so it's great to have some information on it.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of petunia before, tell me more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's hair is indeed blond. I've noticed that myself.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of someone with blond hair before, valeria, tell me more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's hair is indeed blond. I've noticed it myself when we were hanging out last weekend.
capsules_submitted.reply: that rings a bell. valeria told me that petunia has blond hair.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia, I think she's got that blonde hair thing going on. I'm fairly certain about it, to be honest. It's a pretty neutral feeling, but I guess you could say I'm slightly optimistic about her appearance.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's definitely wearing glasses. I'm quite sure about it, actually. He looked pretty confident in them too, which makes sense since they're really good for his eyesight.
